item.description:
I know PF Changs is a "chain" restaurant but I really do love to indulge with their food and drinks sometimes. Let's get together and have a great dinner! As usual, please bring cash if you can, in case they can't do separate checks. And be prepared for a gratuity if the party gets large enough. Also, please be mindful with your RSVP. If you need to cancel within 24 hours, please contact me directly via email or a phone call or text. No shows make me and the group look bad if we show up with much less than we made a reservation for.

Also cross posted this with my other group for a chance to meet more people.Â http://www.meetup.com/Wine-and-Dine-Social-Group/events/77410532/
item.how_to_find_us: I will make a reservation in my name, but call or text if you can't find us 716-307-6590

group.name: Eat, Laugh, and Be Merry in West Hartford

item.name: Dinner at PF Changs (West Farms Mall) Fri Sept 21st
